info.description: DeepVISS (Deep Vision Interoperability Specification Standard) allows several computer vision solutions to produce, consume and exchange events in the same format.

creationTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00)

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00)

image.description: Alpa-numeric, unique id of media item path.

storageCost.description: cost for storage in dollars per month

estimatedShardCost.description: cost for storage in dollars per month

totalCost.description: cost for storage in dollars per month

evaluationPolicyId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of evaluation policy

dispatchPolicyId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of dispatch policy

creationTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00)

completionPercentageForCollaborator.description: completion percentage of a challenge for a collaborator

evaluationPolicyId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of evaluation policy

dispatchPolicyId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of dispatch policy

evaluationPolicyId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of evaluation policy

dispatchPolicyId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of dispatch policy

size.description: Size of files when represented in binary, without additional encoding. Used for de-duplication.

hash.description: Cryptographic hash of original file. Used for de-duplication.

pHash.description: Perceptual representation of the content of the media. Used for de-duplication.

mediaItemId.description: [TBD] Alpha-numeric, unique id of media item

descriptor.description: Information about the evaluation of the accuracy of this tag.

sharding.description: Information about the shardId, the block id and the sharding policy this media items should conform to.

image.description: Alpa-numeric, unique id of media item path.

averageCompletionTime.description: Average time to complete a task for a challenge

completionTimePassed.description: completion time for all the task passed miliseconds

completionTimeReal.description: completion time for all the tasks miliseconds

ShardingDescriptor.description: The confidence of a merged tag (from several tags) or the overall.

Evaluation.description: The confidence of a merged tag (from several tags) or the overall.

confidence.description: The confidence of the merged tag (from several tags), based on IoU (Intersection over Union) of the composing tags. The confidence is the reduce form of the SubjectiveOpinion, representing only its belief part.

subjectiveOpinion.description: The normalized form of InternalSubjectiveOpinion. Confidence represented the belief components of this object.

taskId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of user who has performed the task

avatarId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of user who has performed the task.

attemptSequenceNumber.description: Identifies the number of evaluation attempts performed on this specific media item.

generationTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00) when the task was requested by the user

submissionTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00) when the task was submitted by the user

image.description: Alpa-numeric, unique id of media item path.

tagId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

submissionTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00)

nodeType.description: What does the object that has been detected represent. Can be extended to discrete histogram of types.

geometry.description: What are the shapes that compose the tag?

taskId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of task object

mediaItemId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

challengeId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

permanentIdentifier.description: Identifier (key) composed of several composable elements (sub-keys). Uniqueness is enforced on all segments, in their respective order.

nodeType.description: What type of object/event has been detected?

geometry.description: What are the shapes that have been merged to determine this tag?

evaluation.description: Information about the evaluation of the accuracy of this tag.

composingTags.description: What are the tags which have been merged?

taggedMediaItemId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

mediaItemId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

challengeId.description: Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

composingTasks.description: What are the tasks contributed in the determination of these tags?

image.description: Alpa-numeric, unique id of media item path.

EvaluationPolicy.description: The parameters used in the evaluation of a challenge, its tasks and their Tags.

spatialOverlapThreshold.description: The minimum amount of overlap between two tags, which, in conjuction with a matching object-type, is a condition for merging two tags

harshness.description: The penalty incurred for a tag that is NOT matched with other tags

rankOfMean.description: The rank (power) of the generalized mean used for evaluating a task composed of several tags. Negative values mean harsher evaluations, values larger than 1.0 mean less harsh evaluations. Default value is 1.0 (arithmetic mean).

summationType.description: If set to 'algebraic', negative results on one task will be substracted from user payout.

DispatchPolicy.description: The parameters used in the disaptch of a task

numberOfUsers.description: Number of users that are assigned the same task

mediaItemLockTimeout.description: Time to wait before assign the same mediaItem to other user

creationTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00)

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: Date and time expressed according to ISO 8601 (e.g. 2018-06-24T23:10:28+03:00)

sourceTagId.description: Need to find solution for unifying tag id's across taggers-collaborators.Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

destinationTagID.description: Need to find solution for unifying tag id's across taggers-collaborators. Alpha-numeric, unique id of tagged object

edgeType.description: The type of the relationship between the two objects. Can be extended to discrete histogram of types. All types must belong to taxonomy or the challenge must allow for open-taxonomy.

slack.description: How much the edge can allow for the nodes to move without changing its length?

elasticity.description: How much the edge can extended or contracted?
